channel.title: Comments for page "The Gender Gap in Coding"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
A very interesting read, thanks!

You have a very good point w/regards to the different communication patterns and how socializing became more important nowadays.

Also interesting ideas :)

item.title: Something to watch
item.content:encoded:
Hi Pieter,

If this subject interests you as it does me, I highly recommend watching at least the first of the seven part documentary called 'Brainwashing in Norway'. It's a top-notch Norwegian production hosted by one of their best-known comedians. I admit I learned something about gender equality and I thought I was already pretty well informed.

Hmm, it looks like I can't post clickable links yet, so you'll need to insert periods in the hostname.

www dailymotion com/playlist/x1xv47_BrainwashingInNorway_hjernevask-english-subtitles/1

Cheers,
Adrian
